alert.note: Alert for Imperial County Southeast; Palo Verde Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 8:13PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Imperial County through 900 PM PDT... At 811 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Algodones Dunes, or 18 miles northwest of Yuma, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds will create hazardous driving conditions due to more difficult handling conditions and reduced visibility in blowing dust. Locations impacted include... Algodones Dunes. This includes CA Interstate 8 between mile markers 79 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Imperial County Southeast; Palo Verde Valley
